author: Joseph Green
title: Here's a handy place to buy reusable face masks
description: TL;DR: Etsy is still stocking a wide range of reusable face masks, with options available for less than £1. We're all doing our best to practise social distancing, but sometimes it's really not that easy to stay away from others. This is when a face mask can …
content:
TL;DR: Etsy is still stocking a wide range of reusable face masks, with options available for less than £1.
We're all doing our best to practise social distancing, but sometimes it's really not that easy to stay away from others. This is when a face mask can… [+957 chars]
